events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and refund.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's returned product.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also let us know the reason for the return and if the product was opened or used?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on your site. It was unopened and still in its original packaging.
We can process your refund once we receive the product back. Please use the prepaid return label that we will email you shortly.
Thank you for your quick response and for sending the return label. I will ship the product back today.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We’re closing your case now. Thank you for contacting customer support and we hope to serve you better next time.
